title: Breastfeeding Support Simulation Training for Nursing Managers

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic nursing knowledge and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practice-centered environment utilizing VR equipment and simulation kits.

learning_goals: Learners can explain WHO breastfeeding recommendations with over 80% accuracy
Learners can apply at least three nursing interventions when solving breastfeeding problems in VR simulation environments
Learners can utilize an LCT-based decision-making framework in ethical dilemma situations during breastfeeding support
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
